attributes.action: Consistency for colours of Salt & Vinegar and Cheese & Onion crisps
attributes.additional_details:
This may seem like a petty issue to have but I regularly find myself waisting time looking for the flavour I want and I know I am not alone.
Fixing this issue would allow people to be more productive with their lives and I believe that solving this would make everyone across the country much happier during these challenging times.
attributes.background: For too long multinational food corporations have been able to produce packaging in whatever colour they see fit and it has resulted in hours wasted as people look for the right flavour. Their should be consistency of which colours correspond to which flavours.
